name: Pizza Cafe VR
summary: In Pizza Cafe VR, step into the exciting world of virtual reality where you become the proud owner of a bustling and delightful pizza cafe! Put on your chef's hat and get ready to create mouthwatering pizzas to satisfy your hungry customers' cravings. Top the perfect pizza just the way your customers like it. As you serve more customers and earn profits, you can invest in thrilling upgrades, not only unlocking a wide range of delectable toppings but also acquiring state-of-the-art equipment to enhance...
